intro: Ouratea iquitosensis, commonly known as the Iquitos ouratea, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to the tropical rainforests of the Amazon Basin, particularly in Peru and Colombia. The plant is characterized by its dense, evergreen foliage and clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers. Its leaves are typically elliptical with a smooth surface and a slightly waxy texture. The plant is often found growing in shaded understory conditions, contributing to the biodiversity of its ecosystem.
